page.title: 07THURSTON FETE 8TH JUNE 1985
page.content: ONE FAMILY'S DAY---PREPARATION Preparations began with making costumes for the Friends of Thurston Primary School Float Â£Circus'. On the Friday before the Fete we went to Elm Farm to decorate the Float.The decorations had been made by the school children,who had thoroughly enjoyed drawing clown faces and animals. Saturday dawned bright and clear.The children were very excited.We went to the field,where many people were setting up tents and stalls. After lunch Christopher put on his clown suit and had his face made up.He at once began Â£clowning' around.Next James was costumed and made up.Then he pulled faces in the mirror. Then it was mother's turn to get ready,complete with pink sprayed hair.
